bibl.title: Studia classica Iohanni Tarditi oblata. I
bibl.note: A survey of some of the earlier contributions to the study of Herodas, and an analysis of Herodas' techniques.
bibl.seg: Studia classica Iohanni Tarditi oblata. I = Biblioteca di Aevum antiquum. 7 (Milano, 1995) pp. 657-673.
A survey of some of the earlier contributions to the study of Herodas, and an analysis of Herodas' techniques.
